title: My keyboard and mouse went ghost
body:
As soon as the game starts my keyboard and mouse goes ghost. I can not move or  use "G" to command that I am in the game. I can not even  buy items. The only thing i can really do is press ALT.TAB.DELETE to close the browser. I tried playing a custom game and the problem still happens there. I just got a new Red Dragon mouse on amazon. Would that matter?
Please i need help. Ive been reported and now have been on a five game twenty minute que :(

replies.body:
Oh snap that would really ruin a match pretty quickly for sure =( . It almost sounds like your keybinds were either completely missing or totally messed up altogether so let's try giving those a manual reset to be sure that's not the problem first.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
